info.title: Bullring Finance API
info.description: The Bullring Finance API allows you to build powerful cross-border payment solutions.

tags.name: Verification
tags.description: Endpoints for subaccount verification, including KYC and KYB processes.

tags.name: Banking > Deposits
tags.description: Endpoints for handling deposits into subaccounts.

tags.name: Banking > Withdrawals
tags.description: Endpoints for handling withdrawals from subaccounts.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific subaccount using its ID.

parameters.name: subaccountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the subaccount

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

example.message: You do not have permission to access this resource

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all user subaccounts for a particular account.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

example.message: You do not have permission to access this resource

post.description: Submit information for Tier One verification for NGN or BRL subaccounts. The request body format varies based on the subaccount's currency.

cpfNumber.description: Brazilian CPF number for individual verification

cnpjNumber.description: Brazilian CNPJ number for business verification (optional, use either cpfNumber or cnpjNumber)

parameters.name: subaccountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the subaccount

processingTimeMs.description: Time taken to process the verification in milliseconds

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

example.message: You do not have permission to access this resource

post.description: Submit information for Tier Two Know Your Business (KYB) or Know Your Customer (KYC) verification. This endpoint initiates the verification process and returns a URL to the verification form.

parameters.name: subaccountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the subaccount

formUrl.description: URL to the verification form where the user can complete their KYB/KYC verification

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

example.message: You do not have permission to access this resource

post.description: Submit information for Tier Two Know Your Business (KYB) or Know Your Customer (KYC) verification.

parameters.name: verificationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the verification

401.description: Unauthorized
